I am an Assistant Professor of Economics at the University of São Paulo (FEA-USP).

My research lies at the intersection of Development Economics and Economic History, with a particular focus on institutional and political change in Brazil during the early twentieth century and its implications for long-term development.

**Research Interests**<br>
Development Economics, Economic History, Political Economy
